backend/main.mo: Primary canister actor managing access control, Firebase sessions, authentication audit logs, and EPIQ wallet storage with support for private keys, recovery phrases, and chain metadata.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old wallet data structures to the new format with chain, privateKey, and recoveryPhrase fields while preserving all other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report documenting two wallet‑related features, including backend EVM wallet generation and frontend structured wallet‑creation flow updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing each component’s functionality and recent updates.
frontend/EPIQ_LIFE_UI_STYLE_GUIDE.md: Comprehensive design system defining EPIQ Life’s color palette, typography, accessibility rules, and styling guidelines.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root component configuring providers, authentication flow, initialization screens, and routing between landing, profile setup, and dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/AdminTab.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for managing users, courses, display name history, and testing data, including search, member-type updates, and Firebase user import.
frontend/src/components/AuthMethodSelect: UI component letting users choose between Internet Identity login or Firebase-based EPIQ Shield authentication, with a modal for Firebase login.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistAnalyze: Generates and displays a user onboarding checklist based on profile, quest progress, wallets, and activity, with completion tracking.
frontend/src/components/CourseManagement: Admin interface for viewing, creating, and expanding course content, including validation and module previews.
frontend/src/components/DisplayNameHisto: Displays display-name change logs with search by principal or display name, rendering paginated history tables.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: Interactive emoji picker with categorized tabs, search, and callback for selecting an emoji.
frontend/src/components/EpcRewardsDialog: Dialog showing a user's EPC rewards and module completion history using queried backend data.
frontend/src/components/EpiqWalletsPanel: Panel for listing, creating, and managing user wallets with dialogs for creation and credential display.
frontend/src/components/FirebaseAuthDial: Authentication dialog handling EPIQ ID login, Firebase verification, profile syncing, and session handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying EPIQ Trust copyright text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, theme toggle, authentication controls, and user profile menu.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Displays a full-screen loading or error state with progress, retry logic, and contextual messages based on stage and retry count.
frontend/src/components/MessagingTab.tsx: Provides a messaging interface with user lookup, message fetching, sending, auto-retry, and emoji insertion.
frontend/src/components/ModuleContentDia: Renders step‑based module content with quizzes, navigation, progress tracking, and module completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/Phase1TestingPla: Static UI component outlining testing steps for authentication, data consistency, and session validation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSettingsD: Modal for viewing and updating user profile fields, primarily allowing display name changes with save handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Initial profile setup modal collecting name, display name, email, and member type before saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/QuestTab.tsx: Displays courses and module-based quest progress, handles backend readiness, retries, and progress updates with expandable module content.
frontend/src/components/SecurityAuditLog: Provides filtering, searching, exporting, and cleanup of authentication audit logs with multiple query options.
frontend/src/components/UserProgressDial: Shows a dialog with a user’s quest and course progress, fetching related quest, module, and profile data.
frontend/src/components/WalletTab.tsx: Manages user wallet transactions, sending funds, retrying backend queries, and listing transaction history across currencies.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirebaseAuth.tsx: Handles Firebase authentication via backend actor, including login, syncing user data, logout, and session checks with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, rewards, quest progress, and admin actions with timeout handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes and sets base styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard_REFERENCE.t: Contains an unused reference dashboard layout with tab navigation retained only for design comparison.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements a tabbed dashboard page showing user profile info, rewards, progress, and admin section using various data-fetching hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Provides a routed dashboard overview with welcome header, stats, and navigation to wallet, messages, and quest sections.
frontend/src/pages/GovernanceDashboard.t: Admin-only dashboard that aggregates user, course, and quest data to display EPC totals, active quests, pending actions, and completion metrics.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero content and a flow for selecting authentication methods including Internet Identity.
Initialization workflow that sequentially verifies authentication, backend actor readiness, and user profile loading with timeouts and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: User profile creation form that collects basic identity and wallet details and saves them via a mutation.
frontend/src/utils/evmAddress.ts: Utility functions for validating, normalizing, and truncating EVM addresses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in session storage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing architecture, requirements, wallet constraints, and known issues for the EPIQ Life platform.
